summary: REQ-25 and REQ-26 appear to be implemented by updating `frontend/src/App.tsx` to mount TanStack Router using the existing `routeTree` and by adding a runtime render error fallback via a new `RenderErrorBoundary` (plus an inline fallback when router creation fails). No changes to immutable `frontend/src/main.tsx` are shown in the modified-files list.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds a prominent warning emoji/icon and a "Refresh Page" button in the error fallback UI (beyond the minimal English error + refresh instruction requirement).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-26 asks for a minimal English message instructing the user to refresh, but does not request additional UI elements like an icon or a dedicated refresh button.
